<h2 id="操作系统笔记">操作系统笔记</h2>

<p><strong>冯诺依曼结构</strong>：代码和数据隔离，指令顺序执行 <br>
<em>easy to use</em></p>



<h3 id="三个部分">三个部分：</h3>

<ul><li><strong>虚拟化</strong>：最大化利用硬件，<strong>共享硬件</strong> <br>
<ul>
<li><u><strong>虚拟化cpu</strong> </u>：将单个或者多个cpu虚拟化成无数个cpu，供多个进程同时使用。</li>
<li><u><strong>虚拟化内存</strong></u>：内存是以字节为单位的数组，每个进程需要独立的虚拟地址空间（Virtual Address Space）</li>
<li><u><strong>虚拟化磁盘</strong></u></li></ul></li>
<li><strong>并发</strong></li>
<li><strong>持久性</strong>（Persistence）</li>
</ul>



<p><img longdesc="./dPVqD8M.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>



<p><img longdesc="./7Uy90QU.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>

<p><strong><em>Tips</em></strong>:<strong>硬件驱动：</strong>跟特定的硬件通信 <br>
<strong><em>Tips</em></strong>:指令的执行过程：</p>

<ol><li rel="1">内存读取到寄存器</li>
<li rel="2">执行指令，操作寄存器</li>
<li rel="3">保存结果回内存</li>
</ol>



<h3 id="设计指标">设计指标</h3>

<ul><li><strong>性能开销（节能）</strong> <br>
<ul>
<li>时间和空间</li></ul></li>
<li><strong>安全</strong>：沙箱隔离 </li>
<li><strong>可移植性</strong></li>
</ul>



<h2 id="虚拟化cpu">虚拟化CPU</h2>

<p><em>将单个或者多个物理CPU虚拟化成无数个CPU，每个进程单独占有一个虚拟cpu</em></p>



<h3 id="进程">进程</h3>

<p>The process：a running program <br>
<em>程序本身没有生命力</em></p>



<h4 id="创建进程">创建进程</h4>

<ol><li rel="1"><p><strong>硬盘上的程序和数据读取到内存</strong></p>

<ul>
<li>早期OS会一次把所有程序代码读入内存</li>
<li>现代OS则是按需读取</li></ul></li>
<li rel="2"><p><strong>分配栈和堆</strong></p>

<ul>
<li>栈是程序静态分配的空间，比如函数名，函数变量</li>
<li>堆则用于动态分配，例如调用malloc函数，以及链表，树，哈希表等数据结构</li></ul></li>
<li rel="3"><p><strong>I/O初始化设置</strong></p>

<ul>
<li>unix每个进程默认有标准输入，输出，错误日志三个文件标识符</li></ul></li>
</ol>

<p><strong><em>Tips</em></strong>：</p>

<ol><li rel="1">paging是以页为单位，进程内的交换</li>
<li rel="2">swaping则是以进程为单位的交换</li>
</ol>



<h4 id="进程状态">进程状态</h4>

<ul><li>Running</li>
<li>Ready</li>
<li>Block</li>
</ul>



<p><img longdesc="./UdALdW2.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>



<h4 id="进程数据结构">进程数据结构</h4>

<p>OS本身是程序，为了追踪每个进程的状态，需要一个进程列表的数据结构（process list） <br>
主要用以保存进程的相关寄存器内容</p>



<h4 id="进程api">进程API</h4>

<p><strong>fork</strong>：把当前进程的情况拷贝一份， <br>
在原进程返回1，子进程返回0，返回值小于0则表示fork失败 <br>
<strong>wait</strong>：等待子进程完成 <br>
<strong>exec</strong>：调用其他程序</p>

<p><strong><em>Tips</em></strong></p>

<blockquote>
  <p>wc命令，显示一个文件的字节数。</p>
</blockquote>

<h3 id="调度系统">调度系统</h3>



<h4 id="假设">假设</h4>

<ol><li rel="1">Each job runs for the same amount of time.</li>
<li rel="2">All jobs arrive at the same time.</li>
<li rel="3">Once started, each job runs to completion.</li>
<li rel="4">All jobs only use the CPU (i.e., they perform no I/O)</li>
<li rel="5">The run-time of each job is known.</li>
</ol>



<h4 id="度量标准">度量标准</h4>

<p><strong>周转时间</strong>=完成时间-到达时间，即单个任务的执行时间</p>



<p><img longdesc="./cz6XiqW.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class="remote"></p>

<p>周转时间是<em>性能指标</em>， <br>
另外一个标准是公平性指标： <br>
<strong>响应等待时间</strong>，（任务到达到开始执行的等待时间）</p>



<h4 id="fifo">FIFO</h4>

<p>先进先出调度，或者<strong>FCFS</strong>（first come，first served），先来先服务</p>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20150928120854.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>



<h4 id="shortest-job-first-sjf">Shortest Job First (SJF)</h4>

<p>假设所有进程同时到达则 <br>
最小执行时间优先</p>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20150928131239.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20150928120914.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>

<p><strong>假如A比BC先到</strong></p>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20150928140812.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>



<h4 id="shortest-time-to-completion-first-stcf">Shortest Time-to-Completion First （STCF）</h4>

<p>进程不是同时到达的，最小完成时间优先</p>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20150928141118.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>



<h4 id="round-robin">Round Robin</h4>

<p>周期执行，考虑度量标准——响应等待时间，</p>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20150928142317.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""> <br>
RR以设定的时间切片执行一个进程，一个切片后换另一个进程 <br>
影响性能的主要因素是进程间切换时的上下文环境切换 <br>
一个解决的方法是：增加时间切片的长度， <br>
<strong><em>Tips</em></strong></p>

<blockquote>
  <p><strong>时间切片的长度一定是时间中断的整数倍</strong></p>
</blockquote>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20150928142240.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>



<h4 id="结合io">结合I/O</h4>

<p>去掉假设4， <br>
进程在处理I/O时，出于Block状态，此时其他进程可占用CPU</p>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20150928143944.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>



<h3 id="多级反馈队列调度算法">多级反馈队列调度算法</h3>

<p>Multi-Level Feedback Queue（MLFQ）</p>

<blockquote>
  <p>1.最优化整个进程的执行时间（每个进程执行时间未知） <br>
  2.减少等待时间</p>
</blockquote>

<p>MLFQ是“基于过去学习，learn from history”典例</p>



<h4 id="基本规则">基本规则</h4>

<ol><li rel="1">进程在单独一个队列</li>
<li rel="2">每个队列拥有不同的<strong>优先级</strong></li>
<li rel="3">相同优先级的进程执行RR规则（拥有较好的相应时间）</li>
</ol>

<p><strong>重点在于</strong></p>

<blockquote>
  <p><strong>如何在进程间分配优先级</strong></p>
</blockquote>

<p><em>类似基于进程行为特征的机器学习</em></p>

<ol><li rel="1">长时间占用cpu的进程优先级低</li>
<li rel="2">频繁让出cpu的进程优先级会被提高，例如等待输入的进程</li>
<li rel="3">cpu事先不知道进程要持续的时间，先假定是短时间进程，给予最高优先级执行完一个时间切片后，优先级降一级以此类推，直至到最低级</li>
</ol>

<p>基本调度规则</p>

<ul><li><strong>Rule 1</strong>: If Priority(A) &gt; Priority(B), A runs (B doesn’t).</li>
<li><strong>Rule 2</strong>: If Priority(A) = Priority(B), A &amp; B run in RR.</li>
<li><strong>Rule 3</strong>: When a job enters the system, it is placed at the highest <br>
priority (the topmost queue).</li>
<li><strong>Rule 4a</strong>: If a job uses up an entire time slice while running, its priority <br>
is reduced (i.e., it moves down one queue).</li>
<li><strong>Rule 4b</strong>: If a job gives up the CPU before the time slice is up, it stays <br>
at the same priority level.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>两个问题</strong></p>

<blockquote>
  <p>1.最低优先级的进程被饿死 <br>
  2.程序会恶意不断获取最高优先级</p>
</blockquote>

<ul><li><strong>Rule 5</strong>: After some time period S, move all the jobs in the system <br>
to the topmost queue.（周期性的将所有进程的优先级重置到最高级）</li>
<li><strong>Rule 4</strong>: Once a job uses up its time allotment at a given level (regardless <br>
of how many times it has given up the CPU), its priority is <br>
reduced (i.e., it moves down one queue).</li>
</ul>



<h4 id="其他问题">其他问题</h4>

<p>MLFQ的参数化需要进行大量的实验， <br>
比如：优先级低的队列拥有更长的时间切片</p>



<h4 id="总结">总结</h4>

<p>• Rule 1: If Priority(A) &gt; Priority(B), A runs (B doesn’t). <br>
• Rule 2: If Priority(A) = Priority(B), A &amp; B run in RR. <br>
• Rule 3: When a job enters the system, it is placed at the highest <br>
priority (the topmost queue). <br>
• Rule 4: Once a job uses up its time allotment at a given level (regardless <br>
of how many times it has given up the CPU), its priority is <br>
reduced (i.e., it moves down one queue). <br>
• Rule 5: After some time period S, move all the jobs in the system <br>
to the topmost queue.</p>

<h3 id="其他调度系统">其他调度系统</h3>



<h4 id="进程公平共享cpu调度">进程公平共享CPU调度</h4>



<h4 id="彩票调度">彩票调度</h4>

<p>其基本思想是向进程提供各种系统资源（如CPU时间）的彩票。一旦需要做出一项调度决策时，就随机抽出一张彩票，拥有该彩票的进程获得该资源。在应用到CPU调度时，系统可以掌握每秒钟50次的一种彩票，作为奖励每个获奖者可以得到20ms的CPU时间。</p>



<h3 id="多处理器调度">多处理器调度</h3>

<blockquote>
  <p>传统程序都是正对单个cpu的，并没有对多核处理器做优化</p>
</blockquote>



<h4 id="单核架构和多核架构硬件cache的不同">单核架构和多核架构硬件cache的不同</h4>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20151008124101.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20151008124123.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""> <br>
<strong>硬件cache基于局域（locality）的概念</strong></p>

<ol><li rel="1">临时局域性 <br>
<ul>
<li>程序可能会重复访问一些内存</li></ul></li>
<li rel="2">空间局域性 <br>
<ul>
<li>程序可能会访问曾经访问过内存的周边内存数据</li></ul></li>
</ol>

<p><strong>某些变量在cache中改变后并不一定同步到内存在中</strong>，此时发生中断，且程序被转移到另外一个cpu，将会发生错误——<strong>cache coherence</strong>（缓冲不一致）</p>

<p><strong>解决办法</strong>，各个核心的cache相互监控，一旦发现其他cache中的的变量值发生改变，则使自身cache中相应的变量作废——（<strong>bus snooping</strong>）“总线窥探”</p>



<h4 id="同步问题">同步问题</h4>

<p><strong>加锁</strong></p>



<h4 id="缓存同步cache-affinity">缓存同步（cache affinity）</h4>

<p>进程有一些状态变量，比如TLBs等等寄存器，换cpu后，这些都需要重新载入，拖慢速度 <br>
<strong>最好的解决办法是一个进程保持在一个处理器核心运行</strong></p>



<h4 id="单队列调度singal-queue-multiprocessor-shcedulingsqms">单队列调度（singal-queue multiprocessor shceduling——SQMS）</h4>

<p>有点：简单 <br>
缺点：</p>

<ol><li rel="1">不灵活，缺少扩展性 <br>
<ul>
<li>为了确保单队列，需要在调度系统上加锁，从而性能受到影响</li></ul></li>
<li rel="2">缓存同步问题：</li>
</ol>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20151008132841.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20151008132851.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""> <br>
解决办法，SQMS有将进程保持在同个cpu运行的机制</p>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20151008132859.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>



<h4 id="multi-queue-multiprocessor-schedulingmqms">multi-queue multiprocessor scheduling（MQMS）</h4>

<p>两个调度系统是独立的， <br>
MQSQ拥有更好的扩展性</p>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20151008141235.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>

假设Q0当中的c完成，</p>

不同的队列会查看其他的队列的工作量，若比自身更加full，则从对应的队列转移一些过来 <br>

<h2 id="虚拟化内存">虚拟化内存</h2>

<p>给每个进程都提供足够大，隔离，私有的内存地址空间</p>



<h3 id="地址空间">地址空间</h3>

<p>每个进程都拥有似有独立的虚拟地址空间（Virtual Address Space），简称地址空间（Address space） <br>
一个程序的内存主要分为三块：</p>

<ol><li rel="1">code <br>
<ul>
<li>程序指令</li></ul></li>
<li rel="2">stack <br>
<ul>
<li>用于分配变量和函数调用地址</li></ul></li>
<li rel="3">heap <br>
<ul>
<li>堆由运行中的程序创建，用于动态分配，比如malloc函数</li></ul></li>
</ol>

<p><strong><em>操作系统如何准确的映射内存，即内存虚拟</em></strong></p>



<h4 id="设计目标">设计目标</h4>

<ol><li rel="1">透明 <br>
<ul>
<li>程序可见的内存地址都是虚拟地址</li></ul></li>
<li rel="2">高效</li>
<li rel="3">保护</li>
</ol>



<h3 id="内存api">内存API</h3>

<ol><li rel="1">栈 <br>
<ul>
<li>自动分配，比如函数，静态变量等</li></ul></li>
<li rel="2">堆 <br>
<ul>
<li>malloc()：void *malloc()</li></ul></li>
</ol>



<h4 id="常见错误">常见错误</h4>

<ol start="1"><li rel="1">忘记分配内存空间</li>
</ol>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-keyword">char</span> *src = <span class="hljs-string">"hello"</span>;<br><span class="hljs-keyword">char</span> *dst; <span class="hljs-comment">// oops! unallocated</span><br><span class="hljs-built_in">strcpy</span>(dst, src); <span class="hljs-comment">// segfault and die</span><br></code></pre>

<ol start="2"><li rel="2">没有分配足够大的内存空间 <br>
<ul>
<li><strong>直接造成缓冲区溢出</strong></li></ul></li>
</ol>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-keyword">char</span> *src = <span class="hljs-string">"hello"</span>;<br><span class="hljs-keyword">char</span> *dst = (<span class="hljs-keyword">char</span> *) <span class="hljs-built_in">malloc</span>(<span class="hljs-built_in">strlen</span>(src)<br><span class="hljs-built_in">strcpy</span>(dst, src); <span class="hljs-comment">// work properly</span><br></code></pre>

<ol start="3"><li rel="3">忘记释放内存 <br>
<ul>
<li><strong>内存泄漏</strong></li>
<li>内存泄漏主要来源是长期运行的程序，服务器，数据库等</li></ul></li>
</ol>



<h3 id="地址转换翻译">地址转换（翻译）</h3>

<blockquote>
  <ol><li rel="1">高效率</li>
  <li rel="2">灵活</li>
  <li rel="3">安全（可控）</li>
  </ol>
</blockquote>

<p><strong>基于硬件的地址转换</strong> <br>
<strong>每个进程拥有自己的地址空间</strong>，实际上是共享物理内存的</p>



<h4 id="两个假设">两个假设</h4>

<ol><li rel="1">进程的地址空间是连续的</li>
<li rel="2">进程的地址空间比实际的物理内存小</li>
</ol>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> <span class="hljs-title">func</span><span class="hljs-params">()</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> x;<br>x = x + <span class="hljs-number">3</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">// this is the line of code we are interested in</span><br><br><span class="hljs-number">128</span>: movl <span class="hljs-number">0x0</span>(%ebx), %eax ;load <span class="hljs-number">0</span>+ebx into eax<br><span class="hljs-number">132</span>: addl $<span class="hljs-number">0x03</span>, %eax ;add <span class="hljs-number">3</span> to eax <span class="hljs-keyword">register</span><br><span class="hljs-number">135</span>: movl %eax, <span class="hljs-number">0x0</span>(%ebx) ;store eax back to mem<br></code></pre>

<h4 id="动态重定位">动态重定位</h4>

<p>（ddynamic relocation） <br>
两个寄存器：</p>

<ol><li rel="1"><strong>基址寄存器</strong></li>
<li rel="2"><p><strong>边界寄存器</strong></p>

<ul>
<li>保证进程不越界访问</li>
<li>两种实现方式 <br>
1，记录最大内存的大小 <br>
2，记录物理内存边界地址</li></ul>

<p>physical address = virtual address + base</p></li>
</ol>

<p>寄存器是MMU的单位，<strong>memorymanagement unit (MMU);</strong></p>

<p>因为地址转换发生在运行时，进程启动后也可以移动地址空间，所以称为<strong>动态重定位</strong> <br>
<em>静态重定位</em>基于软件，安全性无法保证。</p>



<h4 id="硬件总结">（硬件）总结</h4>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20150928221035.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>



<h4 id="操作系统issue">操作系统Issue</h4>

<ol><li rel="1">OS在进程创建时需要寻找足够的空闲地址空间</li>
<li rel="2">进程被结束时，OS需将所有资源（内存空间）回收</li>
<li rel="3">进程间切换需要额外的操作 <br>
<ul>
<li>保存基址和边界寄存器</li></ul></li>
<li rel="4">异常处理机制 <br>
<ul>
<li>比如发生越界访问</li></ul></li>
</ol>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20150928221910.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>



<h3 id="segmentation">Segmentation</h3>

<p>问题：基址和边界之间存在较多的空闲区域，且不够灵活，</p>



<h4 id="段">段</h4>

<p>解决办法：地址空间不同的逻辑段，每段都设置一堆基址和边界寄存器，比如code，stack，heap段 <br>
<strong>这样可以把不同的段放置在物理内存不同的地方</strong>，避免浪费</p>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20150929104511.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""> <br>
寻址：4200</p>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20150929104812.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""> <br>
最高位两位是段掩码11000000000000，16进制为0x300， <br>
偏址掩码为0xFFF</p>

<p><strong>分段为内存共享提供基础</strong></p>



<h3 id="空闲内存空间管理">空闲内存空间管理</h3>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20150929122118.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""> <br>
外部碎片，段的大小不一样 <br>
free()函数并没有指定内存大小，OS必须知道要操作的内存块大小</p>



<h4 id="几个假设">几个假设</h4>

<ol><li rel="1">malloc和free对应的内存为堆，OS专门有个Free list的数据结构来记录空闲内存。</li>
<li rel="2">当前仅处理外部碎片 <br>
<ul>
<li>内部碎片也存在</li></ul></li>
<li rel="3">内存不能被重新分配，即是独占的。</li>
<li rel="4">分配的内存块大小不变 <br>
<ul>
<li>OS可以更改heap的大小</li></ul></li>
</ol>



<h4 id="基本机制">基本机制</h4>

<ol><li rel="1">分割和合并</li>
<li rel="2">堆分配的每个内存块之前有个header，用来保存相关信息（大小）</li>
</ol>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="hljs cpp"> <span class="hljs-keyword">typedef</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">struct</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">__header_t</span> {<br>    <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> size;<br>    <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> magic;<br> } <span class="hljs-keyword">header_t</span>;<br></code></pre>

<ol start="3"><li rel="3">free list 实现：链表数据结构</li>
</ol>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-keyword">typedef</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">struct</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">__node_t</span> {<br>    <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> size;<br>    <span class="hljs-keyword">struct</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">__node_t</span> *next;<br>} <span class="hljs-keyword">node_t</span>;<br></code></pre>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20150929140153.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20150929140134.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20150929140459.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>

<ol start="4"><li rel="4">heap的大小可变，system call返回新的heap end point</li>
</ol>



<h4 id="基本策略">基本策略</h4>

<ol><li rel="1">Best fit：选择尽可能小的空间用于分配</li>
<li rel="2">Worst fit ：选择最大的空余空间用于分配</li>
<li rel="3">first fit：选择第一个适配的空闲空间</li>
<li rel="4">next fit：选择第二个适配的空闲空间</li>
</ol>



<h4 id="其他的分配方法">其他的分配方法</h4>

<ol><li rel="1">Segregated lists  <br>
<ul>
<li>假如一个应用经常用到某个大小的内存块，单独保留一个segregate list用来管理</li></ul></li>
<li rel="2">Buddy Allocation </li>
</ol>



<h3 id="page-页">Page-页</h3>

<p>将虚拟内存大小分成大小固定的块——page（页），对应的物理内存中大小相等的块为Page frame（页帧）。</p>



<h4 id="简单的概念">简单的概念</h4>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20150929155907.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""> <br>
对应的实际物理内存：</p>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20150929155953.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>

<p><strong>页表（Page table）</strong>：记录每一各虚拟Page在实际物理内存中的位置（对应页帧） <br>
<em>每一个进程有一个页表</em></p>



<h4 id="地址转换">地址转换</h4>

<p><span class="" rel="64bf28d2b5e0bcac2cfcde3f1e408683"><span class="MathJax_SVG" id="MathJax-Element-1-Frame" role="textbox" aria-readonly="true" style="font-size: 100%; display: inline-block;"><span><img type="image/png" width="62.0312" height="19" longdesc="__SVG__undefined" src="data:image/png;base64," style="margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0;"></span></span></span>，所以一共6位地址，4个页，高二位被用于划分页，<strong>Virtual Page Numric（VPN）</strong>，第四位是页内偏移量</p>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20150929160354.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""> <br>
例：</p>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="hljs armasm"><span class="hljs-keyword">movl </span><span class="hljs-number">21</span>, %eax<br></code></pre>

<p>21的二进制 是010101。<strong>PFN</strong>：Page Frame Number</p>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20150929160817.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>



<h4 id="页表内容pte">页表内容：PTE</h4>

<p><strong>page table entry (PTE)</strong>，一个PTE记录一对VPN和PFN的映射，想象32bit长度的地址空间，页大小为4KB，则VPN的长度为20bit，意味着一共有2的20次方个PTE，假设单个PTE大小为4bytes，则一个页表的大小就是4M，再假设一共有100个进程，则100个页表总共有400M！</p>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20150929161805.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""> <br>
最简单的页表是一个线性数组，下标是VPN。 <br>
除了PFN还包含一些标志位</p>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="hljs armasm"><span class="hljs-keyword">movl </span><span class="hljs-number">21</span>, %eax<br></code></pre>

<p>对应的汇编地址转换</p>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="hljs oxygene"><span class="hljs-comment">// Extract the VPN from the virtual address</span><br>VPN = (VirtualAddress &amp; VPN_MASK) &gt;&gt; SHIFT<br><span class="hljs-comment">// Form the address of the page-table entry (PTE)</span><br>PTEAddr = PTBR + (VPN * sizeof(PTE))<br><span class="hljs-comment">// Fetch the PTE</span><br>PTE = AccessMemory(PTEAddr)<br> <span class="hljs-comment">// Check if process can access the page</span><br><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (PTE.Valid == <span class="hljs-keyword">False</span>)<br>RaiseException(SEGMENTATION_FAULT)<br><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (CanAccess(PTE.ProtectBits) == <span class="hljs-keyword">False</span>)<br> RaiseException(PROTECTION_FAULT)<br><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span><br><span class="hljs-comment">// Access is OK: form physical address and fetch it</span><br>offset = VirtualAddress &amp; OFFSET_MASK<br>PhysAddr = (PTE.PFN &lt;&lt; PFN_SHIFT) | offset<br><span class="hljs-keyword">Register</span> = AccessMemory(PhysAddr)<br></code></pre>



<h3 id="快速地址转换tlb">快速地址转换——TLB</h3>

<p>内存中读取页表缓慢，所以有了<strong>translation-lookaside buffer（ TLB）</strong>——页表寄存器缓冲，是MMU中的一部分</p>



<h4 id="tlb基本算法">TLB基本算法</h4>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="hljs sqf">VPN = (VirtualAddress &amp; VPN_MASK) &gt;&gt; SHIFT<br>(Success, TlbEntry) = TLB_Lookup(VPN)<br><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (Success == <span class="hljs-literal">True</span>) <span class="hljs-comment">// TLB Hit</span><br>    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (CanAccess(TlbEntry.ProtectBits) == <span class="hljs-literal">True</span>)<br>        Offset = VirtualAddress &amp; OFFSET_MASK<br>        PhysAddr = (TlbEntry.PFN &lt;&lt; SHIFT) | Offset<br>        AccessMemory(PhysAddr)<br>    <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span><br>        RaiseException(PROTECTION_FAULT)<br><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// TLB Miss</span><br>    PTEAddr = PTBR + (VPN * <span class="hljs-built_in">sizeof</span>(PTE))<br>    PTE = AccessMemory(PTEAddr)<br>    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (PTE.Valid == <span class="hljs-literal">False</span>)<br>        RaiseException(SEGMENTATION_FAULT)<br>    <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (CanAccess(PTE.ProtectBits) == <span class="hljs-literal">False</span>)<br>        RaiseException(PROTECTION_FAULT)<br>    <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span><br>        TLB_Insert(VPN, PTE.PFN, PTE.ProtectBits)<br>        RetryInstruction()<br></code></pre>



<h4 id="tlb内容">TLB内容</h4>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20150929170214.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>

<p>PTE的valid位表示该page是否被分配。TLE的v位表示该entry是否有正确的映射 <br>
global：表示是否共享，设置后，ASID被忽略 <br>
ASID： Address space identifier，类似PID <br>
dirty：表示页是否被写入过 <br>
coherence：替换规则</p>



<h4 id="重置规则">重置规则</h4>

<ol><li rel="1"><strong>least-recently-used or LRU</strong></li>
<li rel="2"><strong>random</strong></li>
</ol>



<h3 id="缩小页表">缩小页表</h3>

<p><strong>增大页的大小是一种可行的方法</strong>——页增大会导致内存浪费。 <br>
现在许多处理器架构支持多种大小的页</p>



<h4 id="段和页的结合">段和页的结合</h4>

<p>将AS分为code，stack和heap三部分，对应三个页表</p>

<ol><li rel="1"><strong>分段后,页表不用映射所有的地址空间</strong></li>
<li rel="2"><strong>分段还可控制越界访问（base和bound寄存器）</strong></li>
</ol>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20150929192548.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp">SN = (VirtualAddress &amp; SEG_MASK) &gt;&gt; SN_SHIFT<br>VPN = (VirtualAddress &amp; VPN_MASK) &gt;&gt; VPN_SHIFT<br>AddressOfPTE = Base[SN] + (<span class="hljs-function">VPN * <span class="hljs-title">sizeof</span><span class="hljs-params">(PTE)</span>)</span><br></code></pre>



<h4 id="多级页表">多级页表</h4>

<p>将一个页表拆分成页的大小 <br>
Page directory——PDE <br>
PDE的vaild bit用于表示对应的一个也的页表是否有有效映射</p>

<ol><li rel="1">多级页表只分配有效使用的page，可以有效减少页表的大小</li>
<li rel="2">可以将页表的大小调整成一个页的大小。方便管理</li>
<li rel="3">TLB miss的时候需要从内存加载两次，一次PDE，一次PTE</li>
</ol>

<p>例子 <br>
16kb AS，64byte的页，总共256个页。8位 的VPN，6位的偏移量。VPN0和1为code，4和5为heap，254和255为stack</p>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20150929194427.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""> <br>
假设一个PTE为4bytes，则页表大小：256x4 byte=1kb，分为16个页，一个页包含16个PTE。即PD需要4位</p>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20150929195007.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20150929200223.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>

<p>PD大于两级时</p>

<p><strong>尽量让每一段都分布在一个页的小</strong></p>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20150929200348.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>

<h3 id="交换技术swaping">交换技术Swaping</h3>



<h4 id="简介">简介</h4>

<p>每一个进程都拥有一个虚拟的地址空间，往往和物理内存一样大，甚至更大。 <br>
有时候需要将暂时不用的page移动到硬盘分区，该分区被叫做swap分区，该技术即交换技术。 <br>
swap分区块 的大小应该和page大小一样。</p>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20150929202115.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>



<h4 id="swap规则">swap规则</h4>

<p>实际的物理内存太小，需要将部分page转移到磁盘 <br>
替换规则：<strong>让内存寻址缺失次数最小</strong> <br>
度量：<strong>average memory access time (AMAT)</strong></p>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20150929203119.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>



<h4 id="最优替换规则">最优替换规则</h4>

<p><strong>替换将来最少使用的page</strong></p>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20150929204101.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>

<ol><li rel="1">compulsory miss <br>
<ul>
<li>cache是空时</li></ul></li>
<li rel="2">capacity miss <br>
<ul>
<li>page不在cache</li></ul></li>
<li rel="3">conflict miss</li>
</ol>



<h4 id="fifo-1">FIFO</h4>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20150929204110.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>



<h4 id="随机">随机</h4>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20150929204121.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>



<h4 id="least-recently-used-lfu">Least-Recently-Used (LFU)</h4>

<p>或者<strong>LRU</strong></p>



<p><img longdesc="./QQ截图20150929204310.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>

<p>FIFO和Radom都有可能把重要的page踢出内存 <br>
LRU的表现比FIFO和Random的表现要好 <br>
但是实现LRU需要大量复杂的工作，拖累性能。 <br>
<strong><em>Tips</em></strong></p>

<blockquote>
  <p>硬件支持：mmu可以记住每个page被访问的时间</p>
</blockquote>



<h4 id="接近lru">接近LRU</h4>

<p>时钟算法：clock algorithm <br>
use bit：per page，最近被访问过则硬件置1，软件清零 <br>
替换page发生时吗，时钟算法就是所有page处于环形列表，算法从某个固定的点沿固定的方向寻找use bit是0的page。 <br>
<strong>dirty bit/modify bit：一旦某个page被修改过，则磁盘当中对应的page也需要重写</strong></p>



<h3 id="其他vm规则">其他VM规则</h3>

<p>OS将page载入内存的时间：按需载入 <br>
page写入磁盘的方式：一个个全单独写入，或者收集一部分page一次性全部写入</p>

<p><strong>进程要求的内存超过实际的物理内存</strong></p>

<blockquote>
  <p>admission control <br>
   out-of-memory-killer</p>
</blockquote>



<h2 id="并发">并发</h2>



<h3 id="线程">线程</h3>



<h4 id="一些概念">一些概念</h4>

<p>一个进程拥有多个线程（即一个程序的多个执行点） <br>
<strong>线程共享地址空间,以便共享数据</strong>这是线程和进程的最大不同 <br>
<strong>每个线程拥有一套独立的寄存器</strong> <br>
<strong>线程之间的切换也要上下文切换</strong> <br>
这些状态——进程存到process control block，线程存到thread control block</p>

<p>线程保持独立运行，<strong>所以每个线程都有一个独立的栈</strong></p>



<h4 id="一个例子">一个例子</h4>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-number">1</span>         <span class="hljs-preprocessor">#<span class="hljs-keyword">include</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *<span class="hljs-title">mythread</span><span class="hljs-params">(<span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *arg)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">6</span>                      <span class="hljs-built_in">printf</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"%s\n"</span>, (<span class="hljs-keyword">char</span> *) arg);<br><span class="hljs-number">7</span>                      <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-literal">NULL</span>;<br><span class="hljs-number">8</span>         }<br><span class="hljs-number">10</span>         <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span><br><span class="hljs-number">11</span>         main(<span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> argc, <span class="hljs-keyword">char</span> *argv[]) {<br><span class="hljs-number">12</span>                      <span class="hljs-keyword">pthread_t</span> p1, p2;<br><span class="hljs-number">13</span>                      <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> rc;<br><span class="hljs-number">14</span>                      <span class="hljs-built_in">printf</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"main: begin\n"</span>);<br><span class="hljs-number">15</span>                      rc = pthread_create(&amp;p1, <span class="hljs-literal">NULL</span>, mythread, <span class="hljs-string">"A"</span>); assert(rc == <span class="hljs-number">0</span>);<br><span  <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;<br><span class="hljs-number">22</span>         }<br></code></pre>

<p>上图的程序创建了两个线程，其可能的运行时序如下图： <br>
<strong>调度系统作怪</strong></p>



<p><img longdesc="./1444315750388.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>



<h4 id="共享数据">共享数据</h4>

<p>多个线程操作同一个数据， <br>
每个线程都有独立的虚拟寄存器（上下文切换机制保存和恢复） <br>
数据要先读取带寄存器才能操作，一种可能的情况是： <br>
<strong>线程一将数据读取带寄存器后，被中断，此时线程二对数据进行了完整的操作，比如加一，然后线程一被恢复，继续操作，但此时寄存器的数据并没有更新，是就数据。</strong></p>

<p><strong>critical section</strong>：关键片段？临界片段？ <br>
反正就是同一时间不能被多于一个的线程执行的代码片段</p>

<p><strong>原子操作</strong>：操作完成前不会被中断</p>



<h4 id="并发的几个关键字">并发的几个关键字</h4>

<ol><li rel="1">critical section：操作全部变量（数据结构）的代码片段</li>
<li rel="2">race condition：多个线程同时进入critical section，每个线程都想操作同一个数据结构。</li>
</ol>



<h4 id="线程创建">线程创建</h4>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-preprocessor">#<span class="hljs-keyword">include</span> <span class="hljs-string">&lt;pthread.h&gt;</span></span><br><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">int</span><br><span class="hljs-title">pthread_create</span><span class="hljs-params">( pthread_t * thread,<br>          <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> pthread_attr_t * attr,<br>                <span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> * (*start_routine)</span><span class="hljs-params">(<span class="hljs-keyword">void</span>*)</span>,<br>                <span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> * arg)</span>;<br></code></pre>

<ol><li rel="1"><strong>pthread_t * thread</strong> <br>
<ul>
<li>指向pthread_t类型的指针，该数据结构用于和线程交互</li>
<li><strong>需要初始化</strong></li></ul></li>
<li rel="2"><strong>attr</strong> <br>
<ul>
<li>用于指定创建线程的一些属性，比如栈的大小，线程调度的优先级。</li>
<li>由<strong>pthread attr init()</strong>初始化。</li>
<li>一般指定NULL，缺省</li></ul></li>
<li rel="3">创建线程的执行入口，即线程要调用的函数 <br>
<ul>
<li>这里两个void类型的指针，void*是通用指针，可以转换成其他任何类型的指针。</li></ul></li>
<li rel="4"><strong>arg</strong>：给第三个参数函数入口传的参数。</li>
</ol>



<h4 id="线程结束">线程结束</h4>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> <span class="hljs-title">pthread_join</span><span class="hljs-params">(pthread_t thread, <span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> **value_ptr)</span></span>;<br></code></pre>

<p>第二个参数用于接收线程返回的数据，pthread_join用于等待子线程执行结束。 <br>
<strong>每个线程都有独立的栈！</strong> <br>
<strong>每个线程返回后，栈会被注销！</strong> <br>
<strong>所以线程中的返回值被分配在栈中！</strong></p>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-number">16</span>         <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *<span class="hljs-title">mythread</span><span class="hljs-params">(<span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *arg)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">17</span>                      <span class="hljs-keyword">myarg_t</span> *m = (<span class="hljs-keyword">myarg_t</span> *) arg;<br><span class="hljs-number">18</span>                      <span class="hljs-built_in">printf</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"%d %d\n"</span>, m-&gt;a, m-&gt;b);<br><span class="hljs-number">19</span>                      <span class="hljs-keyword">myret_t</span> *r = Malloc(<span class="hljs-keyword">sizeof</span>(<span class="hljs-keyword">myret_t</span>));<br><span class="hljs-number">20</span>                      r-&gt;x = <span class="hljs-number">1</span>;<br><span class="hljs-number">21</span>                      r-&gt;y = <span class="hljs-number">2</span>;<br><span class="hljs-number">22</span>                      <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> (<span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *) r;<br><span class="hljs-number">23</span>         }<br></code></pre>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-number">1</span>         <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *<span class="hljs-title">mythread</span><span class="hljs-params">(<span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *arg)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">2</span>                      <span class="hljs-keyword">myarg_t</span> *m = (<span class="hljs-keyword">myarg_t</span> *) arg;<br><span class="hljs-number">3</span>                      <span class="hljs-built_in">printf</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"%d %d\n"</span>, m-&gt;a, m-&gt;b);<br><span class="hljs-number">4</span>                      <span class="hljs-keyword">myret_t</span> r; <span class="hljs-comment">// ALLOCATED ON STACK: BAD!</span><br><span class="hljs-number">5</span>                      r.x = <span class="hljs-number">1</span>;<br><span class="hljs-number">6</span>                      r.y = <span class="hljs-number">2</span>;<br><span class="hljs-number">7</span>                      <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> (<span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *) &amp;r;<br><span class="hljs-number">8</span>         }<br></code></pre>

<p>并不是所有程序都会等待子线程执行结束，比如web程序。</p>



<h3 id="锁">锁</h3>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> <span class="hljs-title">pthread_mutex_lock</span><span class="hljs-params">(pthread_mutex_t *mutex)</span></span>;<br><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> <span class="hljs-title">pthread_mutex_unlock</span><span class="hljs-params">(pthread_mutex_t *mutex)</span></span>;<br></code></pre>

<p>简单的例子</p>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-keyword">pthread_mutex_t</span> lock;<br>pthread_mutex_lock(&amp;lock);<br>x = x + <span class="hljs-number">1</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">// or whatever your critical section is</span><br>pthread_mutex_unlock(&amp;lock);<br></code></pre>

<p>注意，pthread_mutex_t类型需要初始化</p>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-keyword">pthread_mutex_t</span> lock = PTHREAD_MUTEX_INITIALIZER;<br></code></pre>



<h4 id="基本原理">基本原理</h4>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-keyword">typedef</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">struct</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">__pthread_mutex_t</span> {<span class="hljs-keyword">char</span> __dummy;} *<span class="hljs-keyword">pthread_mutex_t</span>;<br></code></pre>

<p>pthread_mutex_t类型变量保存了锁的状态（available（unlocked，free），acquired（locked，held）），pthread_mutex_lock()会请求指定的锁，若此时其他线程拥有次锁，则函数不会返回。锁的拥有者（线程）调用pthread_mutex_unlock()，锁的状态变成unlocked，若没有其他线程请求该锁，则锁被释放（free），否则，等待锁的线程会获取锁。</p>



<h4 id="锁的衡量标准">锁的衡量标准</h4>

<p>锁需要OS和硬件的共同支持，高效的锁不仅以低消耗提供互斥锁，还能提供一些其他属性。</p>

<ol><li rel="1">第一个是最基本的，也就是是否提供互斥锁、能够稳定工作。</li>
<li rel="2">第二个是公平性，当多个线程请求锁的时候，是否有线程会被饿死（一直等待锁）</li>
<li rel="3">最后一个是性能表现（加锁额外消耗的时间，）这里分情况讨论 <br>
<ul>
<li>1 单线程单CPU</li>
<li>2 多线程单CPU</li>
<li>3 多线程多CPU</li></ul></li>
</ol>



<h4 id="笨方法禁止中断">笨方法——禁止中断</h4>

<p>早期用禁止中断的方法来构建锁</p>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-number">1</span>         <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> <span class="hljs-title">lock</span><span class="hljs-params">()</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">2</span>                      DisableInterrupts();<br><span class="hljs-number">3</span>         }<br><span class="hljs-number">4</span>         <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> <span class="hljs-title">unlock</span><span class="hljs-params">()</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">5</span>                      EnableInterrupts();<br><span class="hljs-number">6</span>         }<br></code></pre>

<p><strong>优点</strong>：简单！ <br>
<strong>缺点</strong>：</p>

<ol><li rel="1"><strong>安全不可控</strong> <br>
<ul>
<li>万一有个恶意程序不释放锁</li></ul></li>
<li rel="2">多处理器不适用 <br>
<ul>
<li>调到另外一个处理核心就失效了，</li></ul></li>
<li rel="3">假如有I/O操作，锁定进程被block，中断被禁止，cpu无法用中断唤醒被block的进程</li>
<li rel="4">效率太低</li>
</ol>



<h4 id="简单尝试flag">简单尝试——flag</h4>

<p>设置一个flag来构建锁，flag用于提示锁的状态</p>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-number">1</span>         <span class="hljs-keyword">typedef</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">struct</span>  <span class="hljs-keyword">lock_t</span> { <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> flag; } <span class="hljs-keyword">lock_t</span>;<br><span class="hljs-number">2</span><br><span class="hljs-number">3</span>         <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> <span class="hljs-title">init</span><span class="hljs-params">(lock_t *mutex)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">4</span>                      <span class="hljs-comment">// 0 -&gt; lock is available, 1 -&gt; held</span><br><span class="hljs-number">5</span>                      mutex-&gt;flag = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;<br><span class="hljs-number">6</span>         }<br><span class="hljs-number">7</span><br><span class="hljs-number">8</span>         <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> <span class="hljs-title">lock</span><span class="hljs-params">(lock_t *mutex)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">9</span>                      <span class="hljs-keyword">while</span> (mutex-&gt;flag == <span class="hljs-number">1</span>) <span class="hljs-comment">// TEST the flag</span><br><span class="hljs-number">10</span>                                   ; <span class="hljs-comment">// spin-wait (do nothing)</span><br><span class="hljs-number">11</span>                      mutex-&gt;flag = <span class="hljs-number">1</span>;         <span class="hljs-comment">// now SET it!</span><br><span class="hljs-number">12</span>         }<br><span class="hljs-number">13</span><br><span class="hljs-number">14</span>         <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> <span class="hljs-title">unlock</span><span class="hljs-params">(lock_t *mutex)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">15</span>                      mutex-&gt;flag = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;<br><span class="hljs-number">16</span>         }<br></code></pre>

<p><strong>这里有两个问题：</strong> <br>
第一个是正确性：</p>



<p><img longdesc="./1444379995545.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""> <br>
第二个是性能问题，一旦flag为1，请求函数就会一直在重复循环吗，浪费大量cpu性能，（自选）spin-wait</p>



<h4 id="构建一个自旋锁test-and-set">构建一个自旋锁（Test-and-Set）</h4>

<p><strong>test and set 指令</strong>，不同的平台有不同的名字（x86 是xchg），C语言描述：</p>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-number">1</span>   <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> <span class="hljs-title">TestAndSet</span><span class="hljs-params">(<span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> *old_ptr, <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> new)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">2</span>       <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> old = *old_ptr; <span class="hljs-comment">// fetch old value at old_ptr</span><br><span class="hljs-number">3</span>       *old_ptr = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span>;    <span class="hljs-comment">// store ’new’ into old_ptr</span><br><span class="hljs-number">4</span>       <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> old;        <span class="hljs-comment">// return the old value</span><br><span class="hljs-number">5</span>   }<br></code></pre>

<p>注意这是一条指令，将变量的值设为new，同时返回the old供检测，所以叫test and set 指令</p>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-number">1</span>         <span class="hljs-keyword">typedef</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">struct</span>  <span class="hljs-keyword">lock_t</span> {<br><span class="hljs-number">2</span>                      <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> flag;<br><span class="hljs-number">3</span>         } <span class="hljs-keyword">lock_t</span>;<br><span class="hljs-number">4</span><br><span class="hljs-number">5</span>         <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> <span class="hljs-title">init</span><span class="hljs-params">(lock_t *lock)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">6</span>                      <span class="hljs-comment">// 0 indicates that lock is available, 1 that it is held</span><br><span class="hljs-number">7</span>                      lock-&gt;flag = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;<br><span class="hljs-number">8</span>         }<br><span class="hljs-number">9</span><br><span class="hljs-number">10</span>         <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> <span class="hljs-title">lock</span><span class="hljs-params">(lock_t *lock)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">11</span>                      <span class="hljs-keyword">while</span> (TestAndSet(&amp;lock-&gt;flag, <span class="hljs-number">1</span>) == <span class="hljs-number">1</span>)<br><span class="hljs-number">12</span>                                   ; <span class="hljs-comment">// spin-wait (do nothing)</span><br><span class="hljs-number">13</span>         }<br><span class="hljs-number">14</span><br><span class="hljs-number">15</span>         <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> <span class="hljs-title">unlock</span><span class="hljs-params">(lock_t *lock)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">16</span>                      lock-&gt;flag = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;<br><span class="hljs-number">17</span>         }<br></code></pre>

<p>一条指令完成flag的更改并返回，所以锁能正确运行。但是自旋的问题还是存在。<strong>需要OS定时中断</strong>，否则一个线程会不断的循环。</p>

<p><strong><em>自旋锁指标</em></strong> <br>
<strong>一</strong> ，能正确实现互斥锁 <br>
<strong>二</strong>，自旋锁不保证公平性，有些等待加锁的线程可能会一直自旋 <br>
<strong>三</strong>，自旋锁性能不佳，假设单cpu和N个线程都在请求同一个锁，则N-1个线程都在自旋，对于多处理器，特定情况下（线程数和核心数相等）（reasonably）</p>



<h4 id="compare-and-swap">Compare-and-Swap</h4>

<p>这是一些硬件架构提供的另一个指令，在x86系统是 compare-and-exchange，如下：</p>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-number">1</span>         <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> <span class="hljs-title">CompareAndSwap</span><span class="hljs-params">(<span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> *ptr, <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> expected, <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> new)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">2</span>                      <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> actual = *ptr;<br><span class="hljs-number">3</span>                      <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (actual == expected)<br><span class="hljs-number">4</span>                          *ptr = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span>;<br><span class="hljs-number">5</span>                      <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> actual;<br><span class="hljs-number">6</span>         }<br></code></pre>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-number">1</span>         <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> <span class="hljs-title">lock</span><span class="hljs-params">(lock_t *lock)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">2</span>             <span class="hljs-keyword">while</span> (CompareAndSwap(&amp;lock-&gt;flag, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1</span>) == <span class="hljs-number">1</span>)<br><span class="hljs-number">3</span>             ; <span class="hljs-comment">// spin</span><br><span class="hljs-number">4</span>         }<br></code></pre>

<p>在简单的自旋锁方面，Compare-and-Swap和Test-and-Set指令的性能表现一样</p>



<h4 id="load-linked和store-conditional指令">Load-Linked和Store-Conditional指令</h4>

<p>这是MIPS架构提供的一对指令</p>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-number">1</span>   <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> <span class="hljs-title">LoadLinked</span><span class="hljs-params">(<span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> *ptr)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">2</span>       <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> *ptr;<br><span class="hljs-number">3</span>   }<br><span class="hljs-number">4</span><br><span class="hljs-number">5</span>   <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> <span class="hljs-title">StoreConditional</span><span class="hljs-params">(<span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> *ptr, <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> value)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">6</span>       <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (no one has updated *ptr since the LoadLinked to <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span> address) {<br><span class="hljs-number">7</span>           *ptr = value;<br><span class="hljs-number">8</span>           <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-number">1</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">// success!</span><br><span class="hljs-number">9</span>       } <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> {<br><span class="hljs-number">10</span>          <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-number">0</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">// failed to update</span><br><span class="hljs-number">11</span>      }<br><span class="hljs-number">12</span>  }<br></code></pre>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-number">1</span>   <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> <span class="hljs-title">lock</span><span class="hljs-params">(lock_t *lock)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">2</span>   <span class="hljs-keyword">while</span> (<span class="hljs-number">1</span>) {<br><span class="hljs-number">3</span>       <span class="hljs-keyword">while</span> (LoadLinked(&amp;lock-&gt;flag) == <span class="hljs-number">1</span>)<br><span class="hljs-number">4</span>           ; <span class="hljs-comment">// spin until it’s zero</span><br><span class="hljs-number">5</span>       <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (StoreConditional(&amp;lock-&gt;flag, <span class="hljs-number">1</span>) == <span class="hljs-number">1</span>)<br><span class="hljs-number">6</span>           <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">// if set-it-to-1 was a success: all done</span><br><span class="hljs-number">7</span>                   <span class="hljs-comment">// otherwise: try it all over again</span><br><span class="hljs-number">8</span>       }<br><span class="hljs-number">9</span>   }<br><span class="hljs-number">10</span><br><span class="hljs-number">11</span>  <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> <span class="hljs-title">unlock</span><span class="hljs-params">(lock_t *lock)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">12</span>      lock-&gt;flag = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;<br>    }<br></code></pre>

<p><strong>loadlink之后，有可能被中断</strong></p>



<h4 id="fetch-and-add指令">Fetch-And-Add指令</h4>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-number">1</span>         <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> <span class="hljs-title">FetchAndAdd</span><span class="hljs-params">(<span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> *ptr)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">2</span>                      <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> old = *ptr;<br><span class="hljs-number">3</span>                      *ptr = old + <span class="hljs-number">1</span>;<br><span class="hljs-number">4</span>                      <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> old;<br><span class="hljs-number">5</span>         }<br></code></pre>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-number">1</span>         <span class="hljs-keyword">typedef</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">struct</span>  <span class="hljs-keyword">lock_t</span> {<br><span class="hljs-number">2</span>                      <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> ticket;<br><span class="hljs-number">3</span>                      <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> turn;<br><span class="hljs-number">4</span>         } <span class="hljs-keyword">lock_t</span>;<br><span class="hljs-number">5</span><br><span class="hljs-number">6</span>         <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> <span class="hljs-title">lock_init</span><span class="hljs-params">(lock_t *lock)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">7</span>                      lock-&gt;ticket = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;<br><span class="hljs-number">8</span>                      lock-&gt;turn  = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;<br><span class="hljs-number">9</span>         }<br><span class="hljs-number">10</span><br><span class="hljs-number">11</span>         <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> <span class="hljs-title">lock</span><span class="hljs-params">(lock_t *lock)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">12</span>                      <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> myturn = FetchAndAdd(&amp;lock-&gt;ticket);<br><span class="hljs-number">13</span>                      <span class="hljs-keyword">while</span> (lock-&gt;turn != myturn)<br><span class="hljs-number">14</span>                                    ; <span class="hljs-comment">// spin</span><br><span class="hljs-number">15</span>            }<br><span class="hljs-number">16</span><br><span class="hljs-number">17</span>         <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> <span class="hljs-title">unlock</span><span class="hljs-params">(lock_t *lock)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">18</span>                      FetchAndAdd(&amp;lock-&gt;turn);<br><span class="hljs-number">19</span>         }<br></code></pre>

<p><strong>每一个等待的线程最后都能请求到，不会一直自旋，因为每个线程都有一个独一无二的tickt</strong></p>



<h4 id="解决自旋问题">解决自旋问题</h4>

<p>一旦锁定后，其他进程只能循环，无法进行其他操作，浪费时间分片 <br>
<strong>一个简单的方法</strong>：yield()，主动放弃CPU</p>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-number">5</span>       <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> <span class="hljs-title">lock</span><span class="hljs-params">()</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">6</span>           <span class="hljs-keyword">while</span> (TestAndSet(&amp;flag, <span class="hljs-number">1</span>) == <span class="hljs-number">1</span>)<br><span class="hljs-number">7</span>               yield(); <span class="hljs-comment">// give up the CPU</span><br><span class="hljs-number">8</span>       }<br></code></pre>

<p>但是这个方法太被动了，主动权不在OS这， <br>
OS需要一个机制来追踪等待锁的线程 <br>
以solaris为例，他提供了park和unpark两个系统调用，park让请求锁的线程进入睡眠</p>



<p><img longdesc="./1444397715217.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""> <br>
这个方案也并不是完全解决了自旋，m-&gt;guard = 0之前线程可能被中断，导致另一个线程自旋，但是这是有限的。 <br>
<strong>park必须在最后调用，park后线程就sleep了，guard没复位，导致spin</strong></p>

<p>线程1锁定后，线程2在park前被中断，这时候线程1恢复释放了锁，线程2恢复park后不会被唤醒 <br>
<strong>linux的两段lock</strong> <br>
等待锁的线程先自旋一段时间，假如还没请求到锁，则进入sleep</p>



<h3 id="条件变量">条件变量</h3>



<h4 id="定义">定义</h4>

<p>条件变量是利用线程间共享的全局变量进行同步的一种机制，主要包括两个动作：一个线程等待”条件变量的条件成立”而挂起；另一个线程使”条件成立”（给出条件成立信号）。为了防止竞争，条件变量的使用总是和一个互斥锁结合在一起。  </p>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> <span class="hljs-title">pthread_cond_wait</span><span class="hljs-params">(pthread_cond_t *cond, pthread_mutex_t *mutex)</span></span>;<br><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> <span class="hljs-title">pthread_cond_signal</span><span class="hljs-params">(pthread_cond_t *cond)</span></span>;<br><span class="hljs-comment">//example</span><br><span class="hljs-keyword">pthread_mutex_t</span> lock = PTHREAD_MUTEX_INITIALIZER;<br><span class="hljs-keyword">pthread_cond_t</span> cond = PTHREAD_COND_INITIALIZER;<br>Pthread_mutex_lock(&amp;lock);<br><span class="hljs-keyword">while</span> (ready == <span class="hljs-number">0</span>)<br>Pthread_cond_wait(&amp;cond, &amp;lock);<br>Pthread_mutex_unlock(&amp;lock);<br></code></pre>

<p>pthread_cond_wait会先解除之前的pthread_mutex_lock锁定的mtx，然后阻塞在等待对列里休眠，直到再次被唤醒（大多数情况下是等待的条件成立而被唤醒，唤醒后，该进程会先锁定先pthread_mutex_lock(&amp;mtx);，再读取资源  </p>

<p><strong>必须和一个互斥锁配合，以防止多个线程同时请求pthread_cond_wait()，形成竞争条件</strong></p>



<h4 id="一个例子-1">一个例子</h4>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-number">1</span>         <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> done = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;<br><span class="hljs-number">2</span>        <span class="hljs-keyword">pthread_mutex_t</span> m = PTHREAD_MUTEX_INITIALIZER;<br><span class="hljs-number">3</span>        <span class="hljs-keyword">pthread_cond_t</span> c = PTHREAD_COND_INITIALIZER;<br><span class="hljs-number">4</span><br><span class="hljs-number">5</span>         <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> <span class="hljs-title">thr_exit</span><span class="hljs-params">()</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">6</span>                      Pthread_mutex_lock(&amp;m);<br><span class="hljs-number">7</span>                      done = <span class="hljs-number">1</span>;<br><span class="hljs-number">8</span>                      Pthread_cond_signal(&amp;c);<br><span class="hljs-number">9</span>                      Pthread_mutex_unlock(&amp;m);<br><span class="hljs-number">10</span>         }<br><span class="hljs-number">11</span><br><span class="hljs-number">12</span>         <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *<span class="hljs-title">child</span><span class="hljs-params">(<span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *arg)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">13</span>                      <span class="hljs-built_in">printf</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"child\n"</span>);<br><span class="hljs-number">14</span>                      thr_exit();<br><span class="hljs-number">15</span>                      <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-literal">NULL</span>;<br><span class="hljs-number">16</span>         }<br><span class="hljs-number">17</span><br><span class="hljs-number">18</span>         <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> <span class="hljs-title">thr_join</span><span class="hljs-params">()</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">19</span>                      Pthread_mutex_lock(&amp;m);<br><span class="hljs-number">20</span>                      <span class="hljs-keyword">while</span> (done == <span class="hljs-number">0</span>)<br><span class="hljs-number">21</span>                                   Pthread_cond_wait(&amp;c, &amp;m);<br><span class="hljs-number">22</span>                      Pthread_mutex_unlock(&amp;m);<br><span class="hljs-number">23</span>         }<br><span class="hljs-number">24</span><br><span class="hljs-number">25</span>         <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> <span class="hljs-title">main</span><span class="hljs-params">(<span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> argc, <span class="hljs-keyword">char</span> *argv[])</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">26</span>                      <span class="hljs-built_in">printf</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"parent: begin\n"</span>);<br><span class="hljs-number">27</span>                      <span class="hljs-keyword">pthread_t</span> p;<br><span class="hljs-number">28</span>                      Pthread_create(&amp;p, <span class="hljs-literal">NULL</span>, child, <span class="hljs-literal">NULL</span>);<br><span class="hljs-number">29</span>                      thr_join();<br><span class="hljs-number">30</span>                      <span class="hljs-built_in">printf</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"parent: end\n"</span>);<br><span class="hljs-number">31</span>                      <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;<br><span class="hljs-number">32</span>         }<br></code></pre>

<p>为什么要用全局变量done？ <br>
子线程和父线程的执行顺序不定，要是子线程先执行，然后父线程调用wait，就没有人唤醒了</p>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-number">1</span>         <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> <span class="hljs-title">thr_exit</span><span class="hljs-params">()</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">2</span>                      Pthread_mutex_lock(&amp;m);<br><span class="hljs-number">3</span>                      Pthread_cond_signal(&amp;c);<br><span class="hljs-number">4</span>                      Pthread_mutex_unlock(&amp;m);<br><span class="hljs-number">5</span>         }<br><span class="hljs-number">6</span><br><span class="hljs-number">7</span>         <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> <span class="hljs-title">thr_join</span><span class="hljs-params">()</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">8</span>                      Pthread_mutex_lock(&amp;m);<br><span class="hljs-number">9</span>                      Pthread_cond_wait(&amp;c, &amp;m);<br><span class="hljs-number">10</span>                      Pthread_mutex_unlock(&amp;m);<br><span class="hljs-number">11</span>         }<br></code></pre>

<p>为什么要用while循环而不用if？ <br>
假设父线程先执行，调用wait之前被中断，然后子线程执行调用sigal，此时美元后线程在等待，子线程完成后父线程进入wait，将无法唤醒</p>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-number">1</span>         <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> <span class="hljs-title">thr_exit</span><span class="hljs-params">()</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">2</span>                      done = <span class="hljs-number">1</span>;<br><span class="hljs-number">3</span>                      Pthread_cond_signal(&amp;c);<br><span class="hljs-number">4</span>         }<br><span class="hljs-number">5</span><br><span class="hljs-number">6</span>         <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> <span class="hljs-title">thr_join</span><span class="hljs-params">()</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">7</span>                      <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (done == <span class="hljs-number">0</span>)<br><span class="hljs-number">8</span>                                   Pthread_cond_wait(&amp;c);<br><span class="hljs-number">9</span>         }<br></code></pre>



<h4 id="有限缓冲区生产者消费则问题">有限缓冲区/生产者消费则问题</h4>

<p>最简单的例子就是web服务器，生产者线程将http请求放入一个worker queue，消费者线程处理这些请求。 <br>
生产者产生数据，消费者读取数据 <br>
<strong>生产者数据（bound buffer）是共享的</strong></p>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-number">1</span>         <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> buffer;<br><span class="hljs-number">2</span>         <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> count = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">// initially, empty</span><br><span class="hljs-number">3</span><br><span class="hljs-number">4</span>         <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> <span class="hljs-title">put</span><span class="hljs-params">(<span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> value)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">5</span>                      assert(count == <span class="hljs-number">0</span>);<br><span class="hljs-number">6</span>                      count = <span class="hljs-number">1</span>;<br><span class="hljs-number">7</span>                      buffer = value;<br><span class="hljs-number">8</span>         }<br><span class="hljs-number">9</span><br><span class="hljs-number">10</span>         <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> <span class="hljs-title">get</span><span class="hljs-params">()</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">11</span>                      assert(count == <span class="hljs-number">1</span>);<br><span class="hljs-number">12</span>                      count = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;<br><span class="hljs-number">13</span>                      <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> buffer;<br><span class="hljs-number">14</span>         }<br></code></pre>

<p>put假定buffer是空的，并放入一个值 <br>
get正好相反，将buffer置空，返回值</p>



<h5 id="不完美的方法">不完美的方法</h5>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-number">1</span>   <span class="hljs-keyword">cond_t</span> cond;<br><span class="hljs-number">2</span>   <span class="hljs-keyword">mutex_t</span> mutex;<br><span class="hljs-number">3</span><br><span class="hljs-number">4</span>   <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *<span class="hljs-title">producer</span><span class="hljs-params">(<span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *arg)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">5</span>       <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> i;<br><span class="hljs-number">6</span>       <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> (i = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>; i &lt; loops; i++) {<br><span class="hljs-number">7</span>           Pthread_mutex_lock(&amp;mutex); <span class="hljs-comment">// p1</span><br><span class="hljs-number">8</span>           <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (count == <span class="hljs-number">1</span>) <span class="hljs-comment">// p2</span><br><span class="hljs-number">9</span>               Pthread_cond_wait(&amp;cond, &amp;mutex); <span class="hljs-comment">// p3</span><br><span class="hljs-number">10</span>          put(i); <span class="hljs-comment">// p4</span><br><span class="hljs-number">11</span>          Pthread_cond_signal(&amp;cond); <span class="hljs-comment">// p5</span><br><span class="hljs-number">12</span>          Pthread_mutex_unlock(&amp;mutex); <span class="hljs-comment">// p6</span><br><span class="hljs-number">13</span>      }<br><span class="hljs-number">14</span>  }<br><span class="hljs-number">15</span><br><span class="hljs-number">16</span>  <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *<span class="hljs-title">consumer</span><span class="hljs-params">(<span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *arg)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">17</span>      <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> i;<br><span class="hljs-number">18</span>      <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> (i = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>; i &lt; loops; i++) {<br><span class="hljs-number">19</span>          Pthread_mutex_lock(&amp;mutex); <span class="hljs-comment">// c1</span><br><span class="hljs-number">20</span>          <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (count == <span class="hljs-number">0</span>) <span class="hljs-comment">// c2</span><br><span class="hljs-number">21</span>              Pthread_cond_wait(&amp;cond, &amp;mutex); <span class="hljs-comment">// c3</span><br><span class="hljs-number">22</span>          <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> tmp = get(); <span class="hljs-comment">// c4</span><br><span class="hljs-number">23</span>          Pthread_cond_signal(&amp;cond); <span class="hljs-comment">// c5</span><br><span class="hljs-number">24</span>          Pthread_mutex_unlock(&amp;mutex); <span class="hljs-comment">// c6</span><br><span class="hljs-number">25</span>          <span class="hljs-built_in">printf</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"%d\n"</span>, tmp);<br><span class="hljs-number">26</span>      }<br><span class="hljs-number">27</span>  }<br></code></pre>

<p><strong>int loops = (int) arg;</strong> <br>
<strong>一个消费者一个生产者时运行没有问题</strong> <br>
假设有两个消费者线程case1</p>



<p><img longdesc="./1444485448932.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""> <br>
<strong>被唤醒的线程并不一定能马上执行</strong></p>

<p>解决办法，将p2和c2中的if判断改成while循环，<strong>C1被唤醒后，会立马检查count的值</strong></p>



<h5 id="但是这样仍旧有破绽">但是这样仍旧有破绽</h5>



<p><img longdesc="./1444486272298.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""> <br>
三个线程一个条件变量，唤醒哪个？ <br>
<strong>设定消费者线程只能唤醒生产者线程而不能唤醒其他消费者线程</strong></p>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-number">1</span>   <span class="hljs-keyword">cond_t</span> empty, fill;<br><span class="hljs-number">2</span>   <span class="hljs-keyword">mutex_t</span> mutex;<br><span class="hljs-number">3</span><br><span class="hljs-number">4</span>   <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *<span class="hljs-title">producer</span><span class="hljs-params">(<span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *arg)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">5</span>       <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> i;<br><span class="hljs-number">6</span>       <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> (i = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
