i &lt; loops; i++) {<br><span class="hljs-number">19</span>          Pthread_mutex_lock(&amp;mutex);<br><span class="hljs-number">20</span>          <span class="hljs-keyword">while</span> (count == <span class="hljs-number">0</span>)<br><span class="hljs-number">21</span>              Pthread_cond_wait(&amp;fill, &amp;mutex);<br><span class="hljs-number">22</span>          <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> tmp = get();<br><span class="hljs-number">23</span>          Pthread_cond_signal(&amp;empty);<br><span class="hljs-number">24</span>          Pthread_mutex_unlock(&amp;mutex);<br><span class="hljs-number">25</span>          <span class="hljs-built_in">printf</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"%d\n"</span>, tmp);<br><span class="hljs-number">26</span>      }<br><span class="hljs-number">27</span>  }<br></code></pre>



<h5 id="最后的完整方案">最后的完整方案</h5>

<p>消费者线程只有在buffer空的时候在sleep，生产者线程则只有在buffer满的时候才sleep，</p>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-number">1</span>         <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> buffer[MAX];<br><span class="hljs-number">2</span>         <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> fill = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;<br><span class="hljs-number">3</span>         <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> use  = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;<br><span class="hljs-number">4</span>         <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> count = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;<br><span class="hljs-number">5</span><br><span class="hljs-number">6</span>         <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> <span class="hljs-title">put</span><span class="hljs-params">(<span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> value)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">7</span>                      buffer[fill] = value;<br><span class="hljs-number">8</span>                      fill = (fill + <span class="hljs-number">1</span>) % MAX;<br><span class="hljs-number">9</span>                      count++;<br><span class="hljs-number">10</span>         }<br><span class="hljs-number">11</span><br><span class="hljs-number">12</span>         <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> <span class="hljs-title">get</span><span class="hljs-params">()</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">13</span>                      <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> tmp = buffer[use];<br><span class="hljs-number">14</span>                      use = (use + <span class="hljs-number">1</span>) % MAX;<br><span class="hljs-number">15</span>                      count--;<br><span class="hljs-number">16</span>                      <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> tmp;<br><span class="hljs-number">17</span>         }<br></code></pre>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-number">1</span>   <span class="hljs-keyword">cond_t</span> empty, fill;<br><span class="hljs-number">2</span>   <span class="hljs-keyword">mutex_t</span> mutex;<br><span class="hljs-number">3</span><br><span class="hljs-number">4</span>   <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *<span class="hljs-title">producer</span><span class="hljs-params">(<span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *arg)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">5</span>       <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> i;<br><span class="hljs-number">6</span>       <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> (i = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>; i &lt; loops; i++) {<br><span class="hljs-number">7</span>           Pthread_mutex_lock(&amp;mutex); <span class="hljs-comment">// p1</span><br><span class="hljs-number">8</span>           <span class="hljs-keyword">while</span> (count == MAX) <span class="hljs-comment">// p2生产者线程则只有在buffer满的时候才sleep，</span><br><span class="hljs-number">9</span>               Pthread_cond_wait(&amp;empty, &amp;mutex); <span class="hljs-comment">// p3</span><br><span class="hljs-number">10</span>          put(i); <span class="hljs-comment">// p4</span><br><span class="hljs-number">11</span>          Pthread_cond_signal(&amp;fill); <span class="hljs-comment">// p5</span><br><span class="hljs-number">12</span>          Pthread_mutex_unlock(&amp;mutex); <span class="hljs-comment">// p6</span><br><span class="hljs-number">13</span>      }<br><span class="hljs-number">14</span>  }<br><span class="hljs-number">15</span><br><span class="hljs-number">16</span>  <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *<span class="hljs-title">consumer</span><span class="hljs-params">(<span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *arg)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">17</span>      <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> i;<br><span class="hljs-number">18</span>      <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> (i = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>; i &lt; loops; i++) {<br><span class="hljs-number">19</span>          Pthread_mutex_lock(&amp;mutex); <span class="hljs-comment">// c1</span><br><span class="hljs-number">20</span>          <span class="hljs-keyword">while</span> (count == <span class="hljs-number">0</span>) <span class="hljs-comment">// c2消费者线程只有在buffer空的时候在sleep，</span><br><span class="hljs-number">21</span>              Pthread_cond_wait(&amp;fill, &amp;mutex); <span class="hljs-comment">// c3</span><br><span class="hljs-number">22</span>          <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> tmp = get(); <span class="hljs-comment">// c4</span><br><span class="hljs-number">23</span>          Pthread_cond_signal(&amp;empty); <span class="hljs-comment">// c5</span><br><span class="hljs-number">24</span>          Pthread_mutex_unlock(&amp;mutex); <span class="hljs-comment">// c6</span><br><span class="hljs-number">25</span>          <span class="hljs-built_in">printf</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"%d\n"</span>, tmp);<br><span class="hljs-number">26</span>      }<br><span class="hljs-number">27</span>  }<br></code></pre>



<h4 id="覆盖条件covering-conditions">覆盖条件covering conditions</h4>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-number">1</span>   <span class="hljs-comment">// how many bytes of the heap are free?</span><br><span class="hljs-number">2</span>   <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> bytesLeft = MAX_HEAP_SIZE;<br><span class="hljs-number">3</span><br><span class="hljs-number">4</span>   <span class="hljs-comment">// need lock and condition too</span><br><span class="hljs-number">5</span>   <span class="hljs-keyword">cond_t</span> c;<br><span class="hljs-number">6</span>   <span class="hljs-keyword">mutex_t</span> m;<br><span class="hljs-number">7</span><br><span class="hljs-number">8</span>   <span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *<br><span class="hljs-number">9</span>   allocate(<span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> size) {<br><span class="hljs-number">10</span>      Pthread_mutex_lock(&amp;m);<br><span class="hljs-number">11</span>      <span class="hljs-keyword">while</span> (bytesLeft &lt; size)<br><span class="hljs-number">12</span>          Pthread_cond_wait(&amp;c, &amp;m);<br><span class="hljs-number">13</span>      <span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *ptr = ...; <span class="hljs-comment">// get mem from heap</span><br><span class="hljs-number">14</span>      bytesLeft -= size;<br><span class="hljs-number">15</span>      Pthread_mutex_unlock(&amp;m);<br><span class="hljs-number">16</span>      <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> ptr;<br><span class="hljs-number">17</span>  }<br><span class="hljs-number">18</span><br><span class="hljs-number">19</span>  <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> <span class="hljs-title">free</span><span class="hljs-params">(<span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *ptr, <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> size)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">20</span>      Pthread_mutex_lock(&amp;m);<br><span class="hljs-number">21</span>      bytesLeft += size;<br><span class="hljs-number">22</span>      Pthread_cond_signal(&amp;c); <span class="hljs-comment">// whom to signal??</span><br><span class="hljs-number">23</span>      Pthread_mutex_unlock(&amp;m);<br><span class="hljs-number">24</span>  }<br></code></pre>

<p>问题描述，线程请求分配内存时若空闲内存不够，则进入睡眠，等待其他线程调用free唤醒他们。问题是线程1请求100，线程2请求101，线程3free50，线程3怎么知道该唤醒线程2呢？ <br>
<strong>pthread cond broadcast(),</strong></p>



<h3 id="信号量">信号量</h3>

<p><strong>Semaphores</strong>，既可以当所用，也可以当条件变量用，实质上是一个整数值， <br>
<strong>信号量的初始值决定了其作用，必须初始化</strong></p>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-number">1</span>         <span class="hljs-preprocessor">#<span class="hljs-keyword">include</span> <span class="hljs-string">&lt;semaphore.h&gt;</span></span><br><span class="hljs-number">2</span>         <span class="hljs-keyword">sem_t</span> s;<br><span class="hljs-number">3</span>         sem_init(&amp;s, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1</span>);<br></code></pre>

<p><strong>第二个参数0表示该信号量在同进程的线程间共享</strong> <br>
相关函数调用： <br>
sem_wait() <br>
sem_post()</p>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-number">1</span>   <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> <span class="hljs-title">sem_wait</span><span class="hljs-params">(sem_t *s)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">2</span>       decrement the value of semaphore s by one<br>        信号量减一，信号量为负则等待!<br><span class="hljs-number">3</span>       wait <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> value of semaphore s is negative<br><span class="hljs-number">4</span>   }<br><span class="hljs-number">5</span><br><span class="hljs-number">6</span>   <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> <span class="hljs-title">sem_post</span><span class="hljs-params">(sem_t *s)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">7</span>       increment the value of semaphore s by one<br><span class="hljs-number">8</span>       <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> there are one or more threads waiting, wake one<br><span class="hljs-number">9</span>   }<br></code></pre>



<h4 id="信号量实现互斥锁">信号量实现互斥锁</h4>

<p><strong>信号量初始化为1</strong></p>



<p><img longdesc="./1444620527426.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>



<h4 id="信号量实现条件变量">信号量实现条件变量</h4>

<p><strong>信号量初始化为0</strong></p>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-number">1</span>   <span class="hljs-keyword">sem_t</span> s;<br><span class="hljs-number">2</span><br><span class="hljs-number">3</span>   <span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *<br><span class="hljs-number">4</span>   child(<span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *arg) {<br><span class="hljs-number">5</span>       <span class="hljs-built_in">printf</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"child\n"</span>);<br><span class="hljs-number">6</span>       sem_post(&amp;s); <span class="hljs-comment">// signal here: child is done</span><br><span class="hljs-number">7</span>       <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-literal">NULL</span>;<br><span class="hljs-number">8</span>   }<br><span class="hljs-number">9</span><br><span class="hljs-number">10</span>  <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span><br><span class="hljs-number">11</span>  main(<span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> argc, <span class="hljs-keyword">char</span> *argv[]) {<br><span class="hljs-number">12</span>      sem_init(&amp;s, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, X); <span class="hljs-comment">// what should X be?</span><br><span class="hljs-number">13</span>      <span class="hljs-built_in">printf</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"parent: begin\n"</span>);<br><span class="hljs-number">14</span>      <span class="hljs-keyword">pthread_t</span> c;<br><span class="hljs-number">15</span>      Pthread_create(c, <span class="hljs-literal">NULL</span>, child, <span class="hljs-literal">NULL</span>);<br><span class="hljs-number">16</span>      sem_wait(&amp;s); <span class="hljs-comment">// wait here for child</span><br><span class="hljs-number">17</span>      <span class="hljs-built_in">printf</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"parent: end\n"</span>);<br><span class="hljs-number">18</span>      <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;<br><span class="hljs-number">19</span>  }<br></code></pre>

<p><strong>这里需要分情况讨论，子线程立马执行还是父线程继续</strong></p>



<p><img longdesc="./1444620269592.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>



<h4 id="信号量实现生产者消费者问题">信号量实现生产者消费者问题</h4>



<h5 id="第一次尝试">第一次尝试</h5>

<p>这个方案在一个消费者一个生产者线程的时候是没有问题的，但是多个消费者线程的时候呢？注意下面的f1行 <br>
<strong>多个线程操作同一个数据——&gt;竞争条件</strong> <br>
假设两个生产者线程，p1先运行，但是在fill加1之前被中断，此时运行p2，那么，pi写入的数据就被冲掉了！ <br>
<strong>两个生产者线程对同一个数据进行操作时，不当的中断会导致数据被覆盖。</strong></p>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-number">1</span>   <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> buffer[MAX];<br><span class="hljs-number">2</span>   <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> fill = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;<br><span class="hljs-number">3</span>   <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> use = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;<br><span class="hljs-number">4</span><br><span class="hljs-number">5</span>   <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> <span class="hljs-title">put</span><span class="hljs-params">(<span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> value)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">6</span>       buffer[fill] = value; <span class="hljs-comment">// line f1</span><br><span class="hljs-number">7</span>       fill = (fill + <span class="hljs-number">1</span>) % MAX; <span class="hljs-comment">// line f2</span><br><span class="hljs-number">8</span>   }<br><span class="hljs-number">9</span><br><span class="hljs-number">10</span>  <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> <span class="hljs-title">get</span><span class="hljs-params">()</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">11</span>      <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> tmp = buffer[use]; <span class="hljs-comment">// line g1</span><br><span class="hljs-number">12</span>      use = (use + <span class="hljs-number">1</span>) % MAX; <span class="hljs-comment">// line g2</span><br><span class="hljs-number">13</span>      <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> tmp;<br><span class="hljs-number">14</span>  }<br></code></pre>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-number">1</span>   <span class="hljs-keyword">sem_t</span> empty;<br><span class="hljs-number">2</span>   <span class="hljs-keyword">sem_t</span> full;<br><span class="hljs-number">3</span><br><span class="hljs-number">4</span>   <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *<span class="hljs-title">producer</span><span class="hljs-params">(<span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *arg)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">5</span>       <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> i;<br><span class="hljs-number">6</span>       <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> (i = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>; i &lt; loops; i++) {<br><span class="hljs-number">7</span>           sem_wait(&amp;empty); <span class="hljs-comment">// line P1</span><br><span class="hljs-number">8</span>           put(i); <span class="hljs-comment">// line P2</span><br><span class="hljs-number">9</span>           sem_post(&amp;full); <span class="hljs-comment">// line P3</span><br><span class="hljs-number">10</span>      }<br><span class="hljs-number">11</span>  }<br><span class="hljs-number">12</span><br><span class="hljs-number">13</span>  <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *<span class="hljs-title">consumer</span><span class="hljs-params">(<span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *arg)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">14</span>      <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> i, tmp = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;<br><span class="hljs-number">15</span>      <span class="hljs-keyword">while</span> (tmp != -<span class="hljs-number">1</span>) {<br><span class="hljs-number">16</span>          sem_wait(&amp;full); <span class="hljs-comment">// line C1</span><br><span class="hljs-number">17</span>          tmp = get(); <span class="hljs-comment">// line C2</span><br><span class="hljs-number">18</span>          sem_post(&amp;empty); <span class="hljs-comment">// line C3</span><br><span class="hljs-number">19</span>          <span class="hljs-built_in">printf</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"%d\n"</span>, tmp);<br><span class="hljs-number">20</span>      }<br><span class="hljs-number">21</span>  }<br><span class="hljs-number">22</span><br><span class="hljs-number">23</span>  <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> <span class="hljs-title">main</span><span class="hljs-params">(<span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> argc, <span class="hljs-keyword">char</span> *argv[])</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">24</span>  <span class="hljs-comment">// ...</span><br><span class="hljs-number">25</span>      sem_init(&amp;empty, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, MAX); <span class="hljs-comment">// MAX buffers are empty to begin with...</span><br><span class="hljs-number">26</span>      sem_init(&amp;full, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>); <span class="hljs-comment">// ... and 0 are full</span><br><span class="hljs-number">27</span>  <span class="hljs-comment">// ...</span><br><span class="hljs-number">28</span>  }<br></code></pre>



<h5 id="第二次尝试">第二次尝试</h5>

<p>为解决竞争条件，就必须加锁，但是这样会引入<strong>死锁</strong>！ <br>
假设一个消费者一个生产者，消费者线程先运行，这是buffer为空，所以它被挂起，生产者线程运行，不幸的是。此时消费者线程并没有释放互斥锁，</p>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-number">5</span>   <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *<span class="hljs-title">producer</span><span class="hljs-params">(<span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *arg)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">6</span>       <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> i;<br><span class="hljs-number">7</span>       <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> (i = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>; i &lt; loops; i++) {<br><span class="hljs-number">8</span>           sem_wait(&amp;mutex); <span class="hljs-comment">// line p0 (NEW LINE)</span><br><span class="hljs-number">9</span>           sem_wait(&amp;empty); <span class="hljs-comment">// line p1</span><br><span class="hljs-number">10</span>          put(i); <span class="hljs-comment">// line p2</span><br><span class="hljs-number">11</span>          sem_post(&amp;full); <span class="hljs-comment">// line p3</span><br><span class="hljs-number">12</span>          sem_post(&amp;mutex); <span class="hljs-comment">// line p4 (NEW LINE)</span><br><span class="hljs-number">13</span>      }<br><span class="hljs-number">14</span>  }<br><span class="hljs-number">15</span><br><span class="hljs-number">16</span>  <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *<span class="hljs-title">consumer</span><span class="hljs-params">(<span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *arg)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">17</span>      <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> i;<br><span class="hljs-number">18</span>      <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> (i = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>; i &lt; loops; i++) {<br><span class="hljs-number">19</span>          sem_wait(&amp;mutex); <span class="hljs-comment">// line c0 (NEW LINE)</span><br><span class="hljs-number">20</span>          sem_wait(&amp;full); <span class="hljs-comment">// line c1</span><br><span class="hljs-number">21</span>          <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> tmp = get(); <span class="hljs-comment">// line c2</span><br><span class="hljs-number">22</span>          sem_post(&amp;empty); <span class="hljs-comment">// line c3</span><br><span class="hljs-number">23</span>          sem_post(&amp;mutex); <span class="hljs-comment">// line c4 (NEW LINE)</span><br><span class="hljs-number">24</span>          <span class="hljs-built_in">printf</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"%d\n"</span>, tmp);<br><span class="hljs-number">25</span>      }<br><span class="hljs-number">26</span>  }<br></code></pre>



<h5 id="最后的方法">最后的方法</h5>

<p><strong>避免死锁</strong> <br>
很简单，将互斥锁放进empty和full的信号量中</p>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-number">5</span>   <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *<span class="hljs-title">producer</span><span class="hljs-params">(<span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *arg)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">6</span>       <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> i;<br><span class="hljs-number">7</span>       <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> (i = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>; i &lt; loops; i++) {<br><span class="hljs-number">8</span>           sem_wait(&amp;empty); <span class="hljs-comment">// line p1</span><br><span class="hljs-number">9</span>           sem_wait(&amp;mutex); <span class="hljs-comment">// line p1.5 (MOVED MUTEX HERE...)</span><br><span class="hljs-number">10</span>          put(i); <span class="hljs-comment">// line p2</span><br><span class="hljs-number">11</span>          sem_post(&amp;mutex); <span class="hljs-comment">// line p2.5 (... AND HERE)</span><br><span class="hljs-number">12</span>          sem_post(&amp;full); <span class="hljs-comment">// line p3</span><br><span class="hljs-number">13</span>      }<br><span class="hljs-number">14</span>  }<br><span class="hljs-number">15</span><br><span class="hljs-number">16</span>  <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *<span class="hljs-title">consumer</span><span class="hljs-params">(<span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> *arg)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">17</span>      <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> i;<br><span class="hljs-number">18</span>      <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> (i = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>; i &lt; loops; i++) {<br><span class="hljs-number">19</span>          sem_wait(&amp;full); <span class="hljs-comment">// line c1</span><br><span class="hljs-number">20</span>          sem_wait(&amp;mutex); <span class="hljs-comment">// line c1.5 (MOVED MUTEX HERE...)</span><br><span class="hljs-number">21</span>          <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> tmp = get(); <span class="hljs-comment">// line c2</span><br><span class="hljs-number">22</span>          sem_post(&amp;mutex); <span class="hljs-comment">// line c2.5 (... AND HERE)</span><br><span class="hljs-number">23</span>          sem_post(&amp;empty); <span class="hljs-comment">// line c3</span><br><span class="hljs-number">24</span>          <span class="hljs-built_in">printf</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"%d\n"</span>, tmp);<br><span class="hljs-number">25</span>      }<br><span class="hljs-number">26</span>  }<br></code></pre>



<h4 id="读写锁reader-writer-lock">读写锁（reader-writer lock）</h4>

<p>比如一个并发链表，只能允许一个线程在线插入，但是可以允许多个线程的查询操作，因为查询（read）并不会改变链表的状态。 <br>
注意16、17和24、25行，假设第一个read线程进入后，会请求write锁，这样write线程就会被挂起，同理，最后一个read离开时</p>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-number">1</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">typedef</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">struct</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">_rwlock_t</span> {<br><span class="hljs-number">2</span>       <span class="hljs-keyword">sem_t</span> lock; <span class="hljs-comment">// binary semaphore (basic lock)</span><br><span class="hljs-number">3</span>       <span class="hljs-keyword">sem_t</span> writelock; <span class="hljs-comment">// used to allow ONE writer or MANY readers</span><br><span class="hljs-number">4</span>       <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> readers; <span class="hljs-comment">// count of readers reading in critical section</span><br><span class="hljs-number">5</span> } <span class="hljs-keyword">rwlock_t</span>;<br><span class="hljs-number">6</span><br><span class="hljs-number">7</span> <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> <span class="hljs-title">rwlock_init</span><span class="hljs-params">(rwlock_t *rw)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">8</span>       rw-&gt;readers = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;<br><span class="hljs-number">9</span>       sem_init(&amp;rw-&gt;lock, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1</span>);<br><span class="hljs-number">10</span>      sem_init(&amp;rw-&gt;writelock, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1</span>);<br><span class="hljs-number">11</span> }<br><span class="hljs-number">12</span><br><span class="hljs-number">13</span> <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> <span class="hljs-title">rwlock_acquire_readlock</span><span class="hljs-params">(rwlock_t *rw)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">14</span>      sem_wait(&amp;rw-&gt;lock);<br><span class="hljs-number">15</span>      rw-&gt;readers++;<br><span class="hljs-number">16</span>      <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (rw-&gt;readers == <span class="hljs-number">1</span>)<br><span class="hljs-number">17</span>      sem_wait(&amp;rw-&gt;writelock); <span class="hljs-comment">// first reader acquires writelock</span><br><span class="hljs-number">18</span>      sem_post(&amp;rw-&gt;lock);<br><span class="hljs-number">19</span> }<br><span class="hljs-number">20</span><br><span class="hljs-number">21</span> <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> <span class="hljs-title">rwlock_release_readlock</span><span class="hljs-params">(rwlock_t *rw)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">22</span>      sem_wait(&amp;rw-&gt;lock);<br><span class="hljs-number">23</span>      rw-&gt;readers--;<br><span class="hljs-number">24</span>      <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (rw-&gt;readers == <span class="hljs-number">0</span>)<br><span class="hljs-number">25</span>      sem_post(&amp;rw-&gt;writelock); <span class="hljs-comment">// last reader releases writelock</span><br><span class="hljs-number">26</span>      sem_post(&amp;rw-&gt;lock);<br><span class="hljs-number">27</span> }<br><span class="hljs-number">28</span><br><span class="hljs-number">29</span> <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> <span class="hljs-title">rwlock_acquire_writelock</span><span class="hljs-params">(rwlock_t *rw)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">30</span>      sem_wait(&amp;rw-&gt;writelock);<br><span class="hljs-number">31</span> }<br><span class="hljs-number">32</span><br><span class="hljs-number">33</span> <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> <span class="hljs-title">rwlock_release_writelock</span><span class="hljs-params">(rwlock_t *rw)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">34</span>      sem_post(&amp;rw-&gt;writelock);<br><span class="hljs-number">35</span> }<br></code></pre>



<h4 id="吃饭的哲学家">吃饭的哲学家</h4>

<p>问题描述，哲学家吃饭的时候需要两个叉子。 <br>
<strong>不能让所有哲学家同时拿起同一边的叉子</strong></p>



<p><img longdesc="./1444570692090.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>



<h3 id="并发的哪些bug">并发的哪些bug</h3>



<h4 id="非死锁">非死锁</h4>



<h5 id="atomicity-violation">atomicity violation</h5>

<p><strong>本该“原子操作”没有执行完就被中断</strong></p>



<p><img longdesc="./1444571260059.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>



<h5 id="order-violation">order-violation</h5>

<p>线程2的执行需要假设线程1已经执行</p>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-number">1</span> Thread <span class="hljs-number">1</span>::<br><span class="hljs-number">2</span> <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> <span class="hljs-title">init</span><span class="hljs-params">()</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">3</span>       ...<br><span class="hljs-number">4</span>       mThread = PR_CreateThread(mMain, ...);<br><span class="hljs-number">5</span>       ...<br><span class="hljs-number">6</span> }<br><span class="hljs-number">7</span><br><span class="hljs-number">8</span> Thread <span class="hljs-number">2</span>::<br><span class="hljs-number">9</span> <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> <span class="hljs-title">mMain</span><span class="hljs-params">(...)</span> </span>{<br><span class="hljs-number">10</span>      ...<br><span class="hljs-number">11</span>      mState = mThread-&gt;State;<br><span class="hljs-number">12</span>      ...<br><span class="hljs-number">13</span> }<br></code></pre>



<h4 id="死锁">死锁</h4>



<p><img longdesc="./1444572001626.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>



<h5 id="造成死锁的几个条件">造成死锁的几个条件</h5>

<ol><li rel="1">互斥锁</li>
<li rel="2">hold and wait（等待其他资源）</li>
<li rel="3">没有优先权</li>
<li rel="4">循环等待（等待解锁）</li>
</ol>



<h5 id="预防">预防</h5>

<p>有些时候线程一直在循环等待某个锁，我们可以设定一些锁的获取顺序（假设两个所L1和L2，设置先获取L1再L2），但是大型的系统有很多且复杂的锁，但是我们可以设置一写局部（特殊）锁的获取顺序。</p>

<p>针对hold and wait，只要保证相关线程中间不能被中断</p>

<p>针对no preemption， <br>
trylock返回-1，表示该锁已经被lock</p>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-number">1</span>         top:<br><span class="hljs-number">2</span>               lock(L1);<br><span class="hljs-number">3</span>               <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (trylock(L2) == -<span class="hljs-number">1</span>) {<br><span class="hljs-number">4</span>                      unlock(L1);<br><span class="hljs-number">5</span>                      <span class="hljs-keyword">goto</span> top;<br><span class="hljs-number">6</span>                }<br></code></pre>

<p>针对互斥锁 <br>
<strong>发明一些不需要锁的数据结构操作方法。。</strong></p>

<p>调度系统避免死锁 <br>
<strong>有相同锁的线程不能同时执行</strong></p>



<p><img longdesc="./1444574294995.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>



<p><img longdesc="./1444574304318.png" alt="Alt text" title="" type="image/png" src="data:image/png;base64," class=""></p>

<p>最后一个方案 <br>
偶尔运行一下，毕竟概率小，重启一下就好···</p>



<h3 id="事件驱动的并发">事件驱动的并发</h3>

<p>event-based concurrence <br>
并发并不只能由线程构建，比一些的基于GPU的程序和一些Internet服务程序。</p>

<p>事件驱动的并发主要两个问题</p>

<ol><li rel="1">处理这些并发并不容易</li>
<li rel="2">程序员无法完整的控制整个程序</li>
</ol>



<h4 id="事件轮询">事件轮询</h4>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="hljs stata"><span class="hljs-keyword">while</span> (1) {<br>    events = getEvents(); <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> (<span class="hljs-keyword">e</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> events)<br>    processEvent(<span class="hljs-keyword">e</span>);<br>}<br></code></pre>

<p><strong>这里有个event handler，当一个handler处理event的时候，它是操作系统汇总运行的唯一一个程序</strong>，下一步处理哪个event相当于<strong>调度</strong></p>



<h4 id="重要的apiselectpoll">重要的API——select()/poll()</h4>

<p>这两个函数用于接收events，selet主要用于确定一个套接字接口的状态。 <br>
select函数用来等待文件描述词状态的改变</p>



<pre class="prettyprint hljs-light"><code class="language-c hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> <span class="hljs-title">select</span><span class="hljs-params">(<span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> nfds,<br>    fd_set *<span class="hljs-keyword">restrict</span> readfds,<br>    fd_set *<span class="hljs-keyword">restrict</span> writefds,<br>    fd_set *<span class="hljs-keyword">restrict</span> errorfds,<br>    <span class="hljs-keyword">struct</span> timeval *<span class="hljs-keyword">restrict</span> timeout)</span></span>;<br></code></pre>

<p>nfds是文件描述符，指集合中所有文件描述符的范围，即所有文件描述符的最大值加1，不能错！select函数首先检测文件描述符是否可读或者可写。</p>

<p>struct timeval* timeout是select的超时时间，这个参数至关重要，它可以使select处于三种状态，<strong>第一，若将NULL以形参传入，即不传入时间结构，就是将select置于阻塞状态</strong>，一定等到监视文件描述符集合中某 <br>
个文件描述符发生变化为止；<strong>第二，若将时间值设为0秒0毫秒，就变成一个纯粹的非阻塞函数，不管文件描述符是否有变化，都立刻返回继续执行</strong>，文件无变化返回0，有变化返回一个正值；<strong>第三，timeout的值大于0，这就是等待的超时时间，即 select在timeout时间内阻塞，超时时间之内有事件到来就返回了，否则在超时后不管怎样一定返回，</strong>返回值同上述。</p>

<h4 id="事件驱动并发不需要锁">事件驱动并发不需要锁</h4>

<p><strong>无论何时只有一个event在被处理</strong> <br>
<strong>处理事件不会被中断</strong></p>



<h4 id="问题阻塞的系统调用">问题：阻塞的系统调用</h4>

<p>假设一个event需要I/O操作，对于多线程，只要将该线程挂起，执行其他线程即可。但是对于单线程的select来说。整个系统都会被阻塞（block），直到I/O完成。</p>



<h4 id="异步io">异步I/O</h4>

<p>异步I/O就是在处理I/O事件的时候，立即将控制权返回给调用者。 <br>
这里又有一个问题：当一个event异步I/O的时候，必须有一个状态追踪设置，供下一个event处理</p>
